content:
Get into the groove: Speakeasy vibes without all the pretension and twice the cool. Craft cocktails and cult wine are here to quench your thirst while progressive share plates entertain your palate.

Let's Dance! Let's Shout!
2 Grand Entertainment presents Dueling Pianos every Friday & Saturday at Prospect Lounge. This request driven event encourages the audience shout out their favorite songs as two piano players and singers perform face to face on the stage. So grab a drink and sing or dance along!

21+ Arrive early to secure your spot - seating is limited, standing room only after seats are filled
